channel.title: Client jarring problems
channel.description:
i just jarred my client its a [PI] impozzes source V2 it works when i run it but when i get the dropbox public link for jar and paste it to the code the screen stays at starting up then whites out what should i do ?
heres the code:
[code]<center><applet name=client width=765 height=503 archive='http://dl.dropbox.com/u/36779762/Impozzes%20Client%20v2/client.jar' code='client.class'> <PARAM name='java_arguments' value='-Xmx700m'> <PARAM name='server_name' value='test server317'> <PARAM name='detail' value='low'> <PARAM name='ip' value='meowporn.no-ip.biz'> <PARAM name='port' value='43594'> <PARAM name='background_image' value=''> <PARAM name='headicons' value=''> </applet></center>[/code]
